info.card_description: Real-time chat app in the style of AIM and Windows XP using websockets
info.description: A real-time chat application using websockets via socket.io. Made in the the style of AIM from the early 2000s. Allows a user to create a ScreenName and private room, other users can join that room given the code and chat with each other. Yes, it even contains those familiar AIM notification sounds!
bulletPoints: Uses websockets to send and receive messages via react hooks
Contains notifcation sounds for new messages & users leaving/entering the chatroom

info.description: A fullstack webapp to create Teams and add members via a randomly generated code. Allows a user to join other teams, see their announcements, and post their own announcements via TipTap rich text editor. Made to make team managment and organization simpler.
bulletPoints: TipTap rich editor to generate/convert html & JSON
Uses a lightweight Redux alternative, Zustand, for state management

info.card_description: Photography portfolio and E-commerce store powered by Stripe
info.description: A desktop/mobile friendly website to host my personal photography projects. Has a print store which uses the prebuilt checkout from the Stripe API. Store cart state migrated from Context API to Redux Toolkit.
bulletPoints: Implemented Stripe Checkout for print purchases

info.card_description: Fullstack serverless movie checking application using Firebase
info.description: A fullstack serverless application which queries the TMDB database for currently and upcoming films depending on the country you select. Allows a user to create an account, login, and save/delete movies to & from their watchlist which is stored in a database
bulletPoints: User can save/remove movies to a persistent watchlist
Uses session storage for country chosen
Fully responsive, changes based on device screen size

info.card_description: Lightning fast JAMStack blog using AstroJS Framework
info.description: A clean and lightning fast jamstack blog to host my thoughts on cinema. Uses AstroJS to ship the least amount of code possible to increase page speed. This method also greatly improves SEO
